TopicTitle: The planes are still really bad

Articles.Content:
I was mostly looking forward to .22 because I wanted to be able to fly the shuttle-plane back down from the orbital station in that scenario. I've tried building other planes, too, just to check it's not that one.

Since most of the dev time has gone toward gimbal and RCS rotation, will we see aerodynamic simulations improve? It might be a tall order, but without it, it seems STRICTLY like a ballistic rocketry simulation, for my experience.

Thanks.
SQUAD have said several times that they intent on improving ingame aerodynamics but for that they have to rewrite it from scratch or replace it with another one.
